issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: stop shelltest profile active by default

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: Yetus running maven install with bats installed triggers common-test-bats-driver, even if -DskipTests is turned on.

comments.body:
[~aw] - As you opened this jira... 
It seems something regressed in config, as I've just seen failure in HADOOP-12491?
Some of those failures in HADOOP-12491 are definitely related, but not all of them.
HADOOP-12493 fixes the test failures, so the pressure to get this one fixed is a little less severe.  But we still need to fix this.
